Professor.name: 서현권 (Hyun Kwon Suh)
Professor.description: AI and Machine Learning in Agriculture: Computer Vision, Automation, Optimization

PhD.name: 권순덕
PhD.description: Robotics, Computer vision, Reinforcement learning, Computational Fluid Dynamics

project.title: Development and Demonstration of an Integrated Intelligent Vertical Farming Systems with Protected Fruit Vegetables
project.organization: IPET (Korea Institute of Planning and Evaluation for Technology in Food, Agriculture and Forestry) / KoSFarm (Korea Smart Farm R&D Foundation)
project.description: The research focuses on the development and demonstration of an intelligent vertical farming system for facility-grown crops. It aims to establish a crop growth monitoring system for individual plants and develop an AI model for optimal control by analyzing environmental and growth data. Additionally, the study integrates an automated harvesting system with monitoring and transportation technologies to enhance agricultural automation.

project.title: Development of an AI and Agricultural Robot-Driven Vertical Cultivation System for Korean Melons
project.description: research project focuses on the development of an AI and robotics-based vertical cultivation system for oriental melon. This includes the establishment of a monitoring system for crop growth, the development of an AI-driven algorithm to determine fruit location and harvest readiness, and the implementation of robotic navigation with obstacle detection and optimal path planning. Furthermore, the study aims to integrate key robotic harvesting technologies into a unified system to improve efficiency.

project.title: Saemangeum Global Food Hub Development Research
project.organization: MAFRA (Ministry of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs)
project.description: Basic Conceptualization and Feasibility Study for the Development of the Saemangeum Global Food Hub

project.title: Research on developing greenhouse simulators to estimate crop yields and energy consumption
project.organization: EPIS (Korea Agency of Education, Promotion and Information Service in Food, Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries)
project.description: Greenhouse environment and crop growth simulator with energy consumption estimation

project.title: Smart Farm Platform for high-quality and traceable yield. A multi-purpose DDS based on proximal and remote sensing. (ALARAD)
project.organization: IITP (Institute of Information & Communications Technology Planning & Evaluation)
project.description: To optimize the decision making process through the proximal and remote monitoring of meteorological, soil, plant and fruit identifying the critical physiological variables for health, growth and vigor in order to adapt and refine the standard cultivation techniques maximizing fruit yield, quality and food security while minimizing environmental impact and other risks.

project.title: Development of autonomus environment control platform for greenhouses using artificial intelligence
project.organization: IPET (Korea Institute of Planning and Evaluation for Technology in Food, Agriculture and Forestry)
project.description: To develop an AI-based fully autonomous integrated environmental control technology for operating a smart farming, a complex environmental control platform will be created that allows cultivators to implement their desired cultivation strategies by monitoring real-time growth and environmental data.
